data.title: Mozy alternative
data.meta_description: Compare IDrive Online Backup with Mozy and know how IDrive Cloud Backup offers a better online backup plan.
data.text: The digital world is changing, and you need an online backup plan that changes with it. Instead of being locked to one machine with slow upload speeds, try a one-stop solution that lets you back up all of your devices - desktop, laptop, tablets, and smartphones - to a single account! We also offer faster backups with free IDrive Express physical drive uploads, and built-in syncing services so your data is with you wherever you are. IDrive is focused on the future, and is built to grow with your needs.
